mapper.select: SELECT LO.CU_ID,LO.PERSON_TYPE,MAX(LO.TIMING) AS TIMING,LO.QUANTITY_ONDUTY FROM JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY LO LEFT JOIN NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT CU ON LO.CU_ID=CU.ID WHERE CU.FULL_PATH like CONCAT(#{fullPath},'%' ) AND LO.BIZ_DATE=#{currentDate} AND TIMING>=#{beginTime} AND TIMING<#{endTime} GROUP BY LO.CU_ID,LO.PERSON_TYPE

SELECT LO.CU_ID,LO.PERSON_TYPE,MAX(LO.TIMING) AS TIMING,IFNULL(LO.QUANTITY_ONDUTY,0) AS QUANTITY_ONDUTY FROM JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY LO LEFT JOIN NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT CU ON LO.CU_ID=CU.ID WHERE CU.FULL_PATH like CONCAT(#{fullPath},'%' )
AND (LO.BIZ_DATE=#{currentDate} AND TIMING>=#{beginTime}) OR (LO.BIZ_DATE=DATE_ADD(#{currentDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND TIMING<#{endTime}) GROUP BY LO.CU_ID,LO.PERSON_TYPE

select IFNULL(round(avg(case when PERSON_TYPE='1' THEN QUANTITY_ONDUTY END),2),0) as EmpNum, IFNULL(round(avg(case when PERSON_TYPE='2' THEN QUANTITY_ONDUTY END),2),0)+ IFNULL(round(avg(case when PERSON_TYPE='3' THEN QUANTITY_ONDUTY END),2),0)+ IFNULL(round(avg(case when PERSON_TYPE='4' THEN QUANTITY_ONDUTY END),2),0) as NotEmpNum, IFNULL(round(avg(case when PERSON_TYPE='5' THEN QUANTITY_ONDUTY END),2),0) as otherNumEmp from JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY WHERE create_time >=#{begin} AND create_time <=#{end} CU_ID in(select MANAGE_ID from NP_CF_SUBSYSTEM sub LEFT JOIN NP_EQ_AREA area on sub.AREA_ID = area.ID where area.AREA_CLASS='BROUGH' and area.FULL_PATH like CONCAT((select distinct FULL_PATH from NP_EQ_AREA where AREA_NAME = #{name}),'%' ))

select dd.personType,sum(dd.Num) as Num from (select cu_id,PERSON_TYPE as personType,max(timing),IFNULL(QUANTITY_ONDUTY,0) as Num from JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY WHERE create_time >=#{begin} AND create_time <=#{end} AND CU_ID in(select MANAGE_ID from NP_CF_SUBSYSTEM sub LEFT JOIN NP_EQ_AREA area on sub.AREA_ID = area.ID where area.AREA_CLASS='BROUGH' and area.FULL_PATH like CONCAT((select distinct FULL_PATH from NP_EQ_AREA where AREA_NAME = #{name}),'%' )) group by cu_id,PERSON_TYPE) dd group by dd.personType

select concat(concat((date_format(dd.OPEN_TIME,'%m')),'月'),concat((date_format(dd.OPEN_TIME,'%d')),'日')) as name, sum(case when dd.WORK_TYPE='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as EmpNum, sum(case when dd.WORK_TYPE='2' THEN 1 when dd.WORK_TYPE='3' THEN 1 when dd.WORK_TYPE='4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as NotEmpNum from ( SELECT aa.open_time, bb.work_type, aa.card_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT date_format(door.OPEN_TIME, '%y-%m-%d') open_time, door.card_id FROM np_dt_door_inout door FORCE INDEX ( IDX_DOOR_INOUT_1, IDX_DOOR_INOUT_2 ) INNER JOIN ( SELECT sub.id FROM NP_CF_SUBSYSTEM sub LEFT JOIN NP_EQ_AREA area ON sub.AREA_ID = area.ID WHERE area.AREA_CLASS = 'BROUGH' AND area.FULL_PATH LIKE CONCAT( ( SELECT DISTINCT FULL_PATH FROM NP_EQ_AREA WHERE AREA_NAME = #{name}),'%' )) sub ON sub.id = door.subsystem_id WHERE door.OPEN_TIME >= #{startDate} AND door.OPEN_TIME<#{endDate} and door.card_id is not null ) aa INNER JOIN ( SELECT card.id, card.subsystem_id, wtp.work_type FROM np_cd_card card FORCE INDEX (IDX_CARD_1) INNER JOIN np_sys_person person ON person.ID = card.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT controlunitid, person_code, sum(work_type)-5 as work_type FROM np_sys_person group by controlunitid,person_code having (sum(work_type)-5)>0 and (sum(work_type)-5)<=5 ) wtp ON person.PERSON_CODE = wtp.person_code and person.controlunitid = wtp.controlunitid ) bb ON aa.card_id = bb.id GROUP BY aa.open_time, bb.work_type, aa.card_id ) dd group by dd.open_time
